category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_use_calculated_weight_as_measured_weight
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the International Material Data System (IMDS) use calculated weight as measured weight mentioned on the Teamcenter object. The default value is "false"
